Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: மனந்தூயார்க் கெச்சம்நன் றாகும் இனந்தூயார்க்கு இல்லைநன் றாகா வினை.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: To the pure-minded there will be a good posterity. By those whose associates are pure, no deeds will be done that are not good.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition. Left side: A person with a pure mind ('மனந்தூயார்'), represented by a clear, crystal heart, is shown with a happy and prosperous family and children, representing a good posterity ('எச்சம் நன்றாகும்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Right side: A person is surrounded by pure and noble companions ('இனந்தூயார்'). Every action they take, represented by seeds they are planting, immediately sprouts into a beautiful, virtuous plant. There are no weeds or bad plants ('நன்றாகா வினை இல்லை').
Layered_Composition.Background: Both scenes are set in a bright, flourishing, and virtuous landscape, showing the positive outcomes of inner and outer purity.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual depiction of the two benefits of purity: a pure mind leads to a good future/posterity, and pure company leads to unfailingly good actions.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The crystal heart symbolizes a pure mind. The flourishing family represents good posterity. The seeds instantly growing into good plants represent the infallibly good actions resulting from good company.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Both panels are bathed in a bright, warm, and positive golden light. The colors are vibrant and healthy, signifying growth and goodness.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A balanced wide shot that clearly presents the two parallel scenarios and their positive outcomes.

Cultural_Anchors: Pure Mind and Good Posterity ('மனந்தூயார்க்கு எச்சம் நன்றாகும்')
Pure Company and Good Deeds ('இனந்தூயார்க்கு நன்றாகா வினை இல்லை')
The connection between purity and positive outcomes.
